programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Lily's Destiny
programme.desc: With holiday responsibilities piling up, gift-wrapping shop owner Lily eagerly accepts a date with a handsome local realtor. But will he be the one that sweeps her off her feet? Stars Ashley Newbrough, Torrance Coombs.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's plans to marry go awry when she discovers her fiance is a bigamist.

programme.desc: Dorothy must face her ex-husband Stanley Zbornak when her daughter announces her upcoming wedding.

programme.desc: Rose finds herself romantically involved for the first time since her husband's death.

programme.desc: Blanche must decide whether to donate one of her kidneys to the sister she hates.

programme.desc: Realizing that everyone else has a companion, Frasier pursues a mysterious caller with a wrong number.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean convinces unenthusiastic Reba to go clubbing; Van explains the birds and the bees to Jake.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: As he tries to woo a powerful sports agent who also happens to be gay, Van accidentally "outs" his mother-in-law.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba encourages Brock to follow his dream of playing professional golf, Barbra Jean gets upset, fearing it may lead to the end of her marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne's emotions about Van living part-time in Denver boil over when she learns that he lied about having to return to Denver early.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean battle over who should host Thanksgiving dinner and feelings get hurt; BJ cooks.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba allows Kyra to spend time unsupervised with her boyfriend, but she questions that decision when she learns they broke the rules.

programme.title: Christmas She Wrote
programme.desc: When a writer has her column canceled right before Christmas, she heads home to reconnect with her family, only to receive an unexpected visit from the man who canceled her column.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.
